attributes.action: urgently seek the extradition to the UK of the murderer of WPC Yvonne Fletcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: wpc yvonne fletcher was shot and killed outside the libyans people bureau in 1984. her killer was released from the bureau and returned to libya a few days later. in view of the compassion shown by the uk to the lockerbie bomber, her killer should be returned to the UK to face justice

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "urgently seek the extradition to the UK of the murderer of WPC Yvonne Fletcher."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22282


Prime Minister's Office
